00013 ** Subsystem: Scheduler (SCH) packet macro definitions
00014 **
00015 ** Author: David Kobe
00016 **
00017 ** Notes:
00018 **   These Macro definitions have been put in this file (instead of 
00019 **   sch_msg.h) so this file can be included directly into ASIST build 
00020 **   test scripts. ASIST RDL files can accept C language #defines but 
00021 **   can't handle type definitions. As a result: DO NOT PUT ANY
00022 **   TYPEDEFS OR STRUCTURE DEFINITIONS IN THIS FILE! 
00023 **   ADD THEM TO sch_msg.h IF NEEDED! 
00024 **
00025 **
00026 */
00027 
00028 #ifndef _sch_msgdefs_
00029 #define _sch_msgdefs_
00030 
00031 /*************************************************************************
00032 **
00033 ** Include section
00034 **
00035 **************************************************************************/
00036 
00037 #include "sch_platform_cfg.h"
00038 
00039 
00040 /*************************************************************************
00041 **
00042 ** SCH application definitions
00043 **
00044 **************************************************************************/
00045 
00046 /*
00047 ** Table value definitions
00048 */
00051 #define SCH_UNUSED              0
00052 #define SCH_ENABLED             1
00053 #define SCH_DISABLED            2
00054 
00056 /*
00057 ** Table Entry Activity Types
00058 */
00061 #define SCH_ACTIVITY_NONE       0
00062 #define SCH_ACTIVITY_SEND_MSG   1
00063 
00065 /*
00066 ** Synchronized to Mission Elapsed Time States
00067 */
00070 #define SCH_NOT_SYNCHRONIZED          0
00071 #define SCH_MINOR_SYNCHRONIZED        1
00072 #define SCH_PENDING_MAJOR_SYNCH       2
00073 #define SCH_MAJOR_SYNCHRONIZED        4
00074 
00076 /*
00077 ** Major Frame Signal Source Identifiers
00078 */
00081 #define SCH_MAJOR_FS_NONE               0
00082 #define SCH_MAJOR_FS_CFE_TIME           1
00083 #define SCH_MAJOR_FS_MINOR_FRAME_TIMER  2
00084 
00086 /*
00087 ** Schedule table group data field masks
00088 */
00091 #define SCH_GROUP_NUMBER_BIT_MASK  0xFF000000
00092 #define SCH_MULTI_GROUP_BIT_MASK   0x00FFFFFF
00093 
00095 /*
00096 ** Message table definitions
00097 */
00100 #define SCH_MIN_MSG_WORDS       (CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE / 2)
00101 #define SCH_TABLE_ENTRIES       (SCH_TOTAL_SLOTS * SCH_ENTRIES_PER_SLOT)
00102 
00104 #define SCH_NUM_STATUS_BYTES_REQD    (((SCH_TABLE_ENTRIES+7)/8)*2)
00105 
00108 /*
00109 **  SCH command packet command codes 
00110 ** (SCH_GND_CMD_MID and SCH_SC_CMD_MID)
00111 */
00146 #define SCH_NOOP_CC             0   /* no-op command */
00147 
00195 #define SCH_RESET_CC            1   /* Reset HK counters */
00196 
00231 #define SCH_ENABLE_CC           2   /* Enable Schedule Table Entry */
00232 
00267 #define SCH_DISABLE_CC          3   /* disable schedule table entry */
00268 
00303 #define SCH_ENABLE_GROUP_CC     4   /* enable group of entries */
00304 
00339 #define SCH_DISABLE_GROUP_CC    5   /* disable group of entries */
00340 
00373 #define SCH_ENABLE_SYNC_CC      6   /* enable major frame synchronization */
00374 
00405 #define SCH_SEND_DIAG_TLM_CC    7   /* sends diagnostic message packet */
00406 
00409 #endif /* _sch_msgdefs_ */
